Projects History

  • 2015

    MyMiniFactory

    http://rerdos.co.uk/myminifactory
    July 2015 | London, United Kingdom

    AngularJS application that requests 3D objects's data from a locally provided JSON file, then applies it into a fully responsive website with a simple search option that is powered by Angular filters. Furthermore, a modal has been applied from Angular Foundation library in order to bring more interactivity to the website. Responsive design was provided by Foundation library. Bower was used in order to manage AngularJS, Foundation and Angular-foundation libraries during and after the development.

  • 2015

    Final Exam

    http://rerdos.co.uk/finalexam
    June 2015 | Hungary

    Single page application that calculates how many points the student must earn in order to get the better grade in the end of the Hungarian school leaving exam. This application has been developed in AngularJS. Data that the user has provided is stored in the LocalStorage, so users don't have to input their data each time when they visit the website. It contains Bootstrap in order to normalize the webpage (so it will appear the same in every browser) and to have predesigned alert boxes.

  • 2015

    Todo

    http://rerdos.co.uk/todo
    June 2015 | Hungary

    A simple ‘todo’ application that allows its users to add, delete or edit a new or existing to do. Interactivity is provided by AngularJS. The design of alert boxes, lists and buttons as well its responsive design come from Bootstrap framework.
